item.title: 'Focus on driving, talk less' - Ferrari chairman to Hamilton & Leclerc
item.description: Ferrari chairman John Elkann has called for the Formula 1 company's drivers Lewis Hamilton and Charles Leclerc "to focus on driving and talk less" aft...

item.title: Trump Threatens To Sue BBC For One Billion Dollars
item.description: Trump threatens BBC with a $1bn lawsuit over the editing of his speech in a documentary.

item.title: Ros Atkins on... the BBC resignations
item.description: The BBC's Analysis Editor Ros Atkins looks at the resignations of BBC bosses - and how this crisis didn't come out of nowhere.

item.title: Americanswers on 5 Live! Why is Donald Trump threatening to sue the BBC for $1 billion?
item.description: And how will the U.S. government shutdown end?

item.title: Trump threatens $1bn legal action against BBC over 6 January speech edit
item.description: The BBC's director general and head of news both resigned on Sunday after criticism of the programme.
